skills.title: Skills
skills.text: I focus on Web App Development and have a strong background in Computer Science. I create user-friendly web solutions with skills in both front-end and back-end development.

about.title: About Me
about.text: Aoa, I'm Ijaz Ul Haq from Dera Ismail Khan, Pakistan. I have a BSc in Computer Science from Qurtuba University of Science and Information Technology, with a focus on Web App Development. I'm an online freelancer who loves creating efficient and innovative web applications. In my spare time, I enjoy playing video games and constantly learning new things. My future goal is to build a digital multivendor gaming marketplace.
